name: coolify
description: An open-source, hassle-free, self-hostable Heroku & Netlify alternative.

scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yaml up -d && NODE_ENV=development svelte-kit dev --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.start: npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db seed && node index.js
scripts.release:coolify: cross-var docker build -t coollabsio/coolify:$npm_package_version -t coollabsio/coolify:latest . && docker push coollabsio/coolify:$npm_package_version && docker image push coollabsio/coolify:$npm_package_version && docker push coollabsio/coolify:latest
scripts.release:haproxy: docker build -f haproxy.Dockerfile -t coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-alpine:1.0.0-rc.1 -t coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-alpine:latest . && docker image push --all-tags coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-alpine
scripts.release:haproxy:tcp: docker build -f haproxy-tcp.Dockerfile -t coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-tcp-alpine:1.0.0-rc.1 -t coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-tcp-alpine:latest . && docker image push --all-tags coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-tcp-alpine
scripts.release:haproxy:http: docker build -f haproxy-http.Dockerfile -t coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-http-alpine:1.0.0-rc.1 -t coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-http-alpine:latest . && docker image push --all-tags coollabsio/coolify-haproxy-http-alpine
